verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month, in the fifth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> as I <S%H589><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in mine house, <S%H1004><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, that the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me.

Then I beheld, <S%H7200><s%> and lo <S%H2009><s%> a likeness <S%H1823><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire: <S%H784><s%> from the appearance <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4758><s%> of his loins <S%H4975><s%> even downward, <S%H4295><s%> fire; <S%H784><s%> and from his loins <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4975><s%> even upward, <S%H4605><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of brightness, <S%H2096><s%> as the color <S%H5869><s%> of amber. <S%H2830><s%>

And he put forth <S%H7971><s%> the form <S%H8403><s%> of a hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> me by a lock <S%H6734><s%> of mine head; <S%H7218><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted me up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> me in the visions <S%H4759><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> that looketh <S%H6437><s%> toward the north; <S%H6828><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> was the seat <S%H4186><s%> of the image <S%H5566><s%> of jealousy, <S%H7068><s%> which provoketh to jealousy. <S%H7065><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was there, <S%H8033><s%> according to the vision <S%H4758><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the plain. <S%H1237><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> toward the north. <S%H6828><s%> So I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> toward the north, <S%H6828><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> northward <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> image <S%H5566><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> in the entry. <S%H872><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> furthermore unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> seest <S%H7200><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> do? <S%H6213><s%> even the great <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> committeth <S%H6213><s%> here, <S%H6311><s%> that I should go far off <S%H7368><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my sanctuary? <S%H4720><s%> but turn thee yet again, <S%H7725><s%> <S%H5750><s%> and thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

And he brought <S%H935><s%> me to <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the court; <S%H2691><s%> and when I looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold <S%H2009><s%> a <S%H259><s%> hole <S%H2356><s%> in the wall. <S%H7023><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> dig <S%H2864><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> in the wall: <S%H7023><s%> and when I had digged <S%H2864><s%> in the wall, <S%H7023><s%> behold <S%H2009><s%> a <S%H259><s%> door. <S%H6607><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Go in, <S%H935><s%> and behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the wicked <S%H7451><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> here. <S%H6311><s%>

So I went in <S%H935><s%> and saw; <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> form <S%H8403><s%> of creeping things, <S%H7431><s%> and abominable <S%H8263><s%> beasts, <S%H929><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> portrayed <S%H2707><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the wall <S%H7023><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And there stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the ancients <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them stood <S%H5975><s%> Jaazaniah <S%H2970><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan, <S%H8227><s%> with every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4730><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and a thick <S%H6282><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%> went up. <S%H5927><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> hast thou seen <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the ancients <S%H2205><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> in the dark, <S%H2822><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in the chambers <S%H2315><s%> of his imagery? <S%H4906><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> seeth <S%H7200><s%> us not; <S%H369><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> also unto <S%H413><s%> me, Turn thee yet again, <S%H7725><s%> <S%H5750><s%> and thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> do. <S%H6213><s%>

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me to <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was toward <S%H413><s%> the north; <S%H6828><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> women <S%H802><s%> weeping <S%H1058><s%> for <S%H854><s%> Tammuz. <S%H8542><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, Hast thou seen <S%H7200><s%> this, O son <S%H1121><s%> of man? <S%H120><s%> turn thee yet again, <S%H7725><s%> <S%H5750><s%> and thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> than these. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H428><s%>

And he brought <S%H935><s%> me into <S%H413><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the porch <S%H197><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> were about five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> with their backs <S%H268><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and their faces <S%H6440><s%> toward the east; <S%H6924><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> toward the east. <S%H6924><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Hast thou seen <S%H7200><s%> this, O son <S%H1121><s%> of man? <S%H120><s%> Is it a light thing <S%H7043><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> that they commit <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they commit <S%H6213><s%> here? <S%H6311><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they have filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with violence, <S%H2555><s%> and have returned <S%H7725><s%> to provoke me to anger: <S%H3707><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> they put <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the branch <S%H2156><s%> to <S%H413><s%> their nose. <S%H639><s%>

Therefore will I <S%H589><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> deal <S%H6213><s%> in fury: <S%H2534><s%> mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I have pity: <S%H2550><s%> and though they cry <S%H7121><s%> in mine ears <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> yet will I not <S%H3808><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> them.
